Text.text: Project Type: Product Development; Role: Developer; Agile Methodology;
Client: Intel; Role: UI5 Developer; Agile Methodology,

Developed a Warehouse Management System to track and manage inventory, monitor stock levels, and streamline warehouse operations. The application included features for inventory search and stock updates.
Acted as an individual contributor in the development of floorplans and front-end applications. Provided demos to clients to showcase the application functionalities.
Project Type: Product Development; Role: Developer; Agile Methodology;
Client: NSW Transport; Role: UI5 Developer; Agile Methodology,

Developed Custom Fiori applications to streamline various functional processes, including Down Payment, Pre Payment, Accelerated Payment, and Retention. These applications were integrated into the My Inbox app to facilitate a seamless approval process.
Acted as an individual contributor in the development of floorplans and front-end applications. Provided demos to clients to showcase the application functionalities.
